title: Truckload of food aid handed over to Afghan authorities at Torkham border
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 26 (APP): Pakistan, as part of its humanitarian assistance to Afghanistan, handed over a truckload of food aid to the Afghan authorities at Zero-line Torkham Border on Wednesday.
The food aid was sponsored / donated by Al-Khairiya Foundation through Pak-Afghan Cooperation Forum (PACF).
Secretary Al-Khairiya Foundation handed over the aid to Qari Sadaqat, Incharge Torkhan Gate and Saat Ullah, Deputy Kamisar Torkham.
